name: Stitched Tracker
text: Battlecry: Discover a copy of a minion in your deck.
flavor: He's just exercising his right to bear arms.

name: Stormhammer
text: Doesn't lose Durability while you control a_Dragon.
flavor: It brings the storm before the calm.

name: Stormwind Piper
text: After this minion attacks,\ngive your Beasts +1/+1.
flavor: Throws crazy parties with the Rat King—except when it's raining.

name: Tavish Stormpike
text: After a friendly Beast attacks, summon a Beast from your deck that costs (1) less.
flavor: "Hurry up, laddie, we're getting overrun! Serpents everywhere! They may look cute, but do ye see the fury in their eyes?!" —Tavish Stormpike

name: Terrorscale Stalker
text: Battlecry: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
flavor: Likes to scare his friends half to death.

name: Unleash the Hounds
text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Hound with Charge.
flavor: You must read the name of this card out loud each time you play it.

name: Unleash the Hounds
text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Hound with Charge.
flavor: You must read the name of this card out loud each time you play it.

name: Ursatron
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Mech from your deck.
flavor: It's been programmed to include all the bear necessities.

name: Zixor, Apex Predator
text: [x]Rush\nDeathrattle: Shuffle 'Zixor\nPrime' into your deck.
flavor: A living terror. Teleports at will. Feasts on tainted helboar meat. No head scritches unless you're Leoroxx.

name: Arcane Fletcher
text: [x]Whenever you play a\n1-Cost minion, draw a\nspell from your deck.
flavor: Stop trying to make fletch happen. It's not going to happen.

name: Core Rager
text: Battlecry: If your hand is empty, gain +3/+3.
flavor: It takes a special kind of hunter to venture deep into a firey lava pit and convince a monster who lives there to come home and be a cuddly housepet.
howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Dire Frenzy
text: Give a Beast +3/+3. Shuffle 3 copies into your deck with +3/+3.
flavor: It's always Huffer. And Huffer. And Huffer. And Huffer.

name: Dire Frenzy
text: Give a Beast +3/+3. Shuffle 3 copies into your deck with +3/+3.
flavor: It's always Huffer. And Huffer. And Huffer. And Huffer.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Hunter.

name: Dispatch Kodo
text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack.
flavor: "Crime reported at First Bank of Gadgetzan.  Huge quantities of Jade being carried away by what looks like a bunch of Hozen.  Kodo 77 can you make it over there now?"

name: Dragonbane
text: After you use your Hero Power, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: *Thunk* "That wasn’t a dragon!" *Thunk* "THAT wasn’t a dragon!"

name: Exploding Bloatbat
text: Deathrattle:\nDeal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: We've all been there after a night of one-too-many funnel cakes.

name: Flanking Strike
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Summon a 3/3 Wolf.
flavor: Wolves to the left and arrows to the right, here I am stuck in the middle with you.

name: Houndmaster
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2 and Taunt.
flavor: "Who let the dogs out?" he asks.  It's rhetorical.

name: Houndmaster
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2 and Taunt.
flavor: "Who let the dogs out?" he asks.  It's rhetorical.

name: Houndmaster Shaw
text: Your other minions have\nRush.
flavor: They’re good dogs, Tess.

name: Hyena Alpha
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control\na Secret, summon two\n2/2 Hyenas.
flavor: Everything the sun touches is ours—so long as it's already dead.

name: Infested Wolf
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Spiders.
flavor: A little flea powder will fix that right up.

name: Krolusk Barkstripper
text: Spellburst: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: My friend went krolusk tipping once… once!

name: Marked Shot
text: Deal $4 damage to_a_minion. Discover_a_spell.
flavor: Obviously it's marked for greatness.

name: Mok'Nathal Lion
text: Rush. Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Gain a copy of its Deathrattle.
flavor: Never underestimate a lioness when her pride is on the line.

name: Multi-Shot
text: Deal $3 damage to two random enemy minions.
flavor: You see, it's all about throughput.

name: Multi-Shot
text: Deal $3 damage to two random enemy minions.
flavor: You see, it's all about throughput.

name: Necromechanic
text: Your Deathrattles trigger twice.
flavor: If at first you don't succeed, die, die again.

name: Piercing Shot
text: Deal $6 damage to a minion. Excess damage hits the enemy hero.
flavor: Goblins hate wasting money on unnecessary ammunition.

name: Professor Putricide
text: After you play a Secret,\nput a random Hunter Secret into the battlefield.
flavor: Among his more notable inventions: A tentacle-groomer, a plague that would wipe out all life on Azeroth, and a fidget spinner.

name: Rinling's Rifle
text: After your hero attacks, Discover a Secret and cast it.
flavor: This rifle needs a muzzle for its muzzle.

name: Rodent Nest
text: Deathrattle: Summon five 1/1 Rats.
flavor: Pig sty? No, this is a rat's nest.

name: Scrap Shot
text: Deal $3 damage.\nGive a random Beast in_your hand +3/+3.
flavor: Make your foe's armor your fauna's fashion!

name: Sin'dorei Scentfinder
text: Frenzy: Summon four 1/1 Hyenas with Rush.
flavor: Loves candles. Hates deodorant.

name: Toxmonger
text: [x]Whenever you play a 1-Cost\nminion, give it Poisonous.
flavor: Not all spiders are born poisonous. That's where he comes in.

name: Venomstrike Bow
text: Poisonous
flavor: "You know you only have to coat the arrowhead in poison and not the entire bow, right?"

name: Warsong Wrangler
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a Beast from your deck. Give all copies of it +2/+1 (wherever_they_are).
flavor: "Me? Playing favorites? I love my beasts all the same!"

name: Wing Blast
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. If a minion died this turn, this costs (1).
flavor: Emeriss uses Wing Blast.  It's super effective!

name: Baited Arrow
text: Deal $3 damage. Overkill: Summon a 5/5 Devilsaur.
flavor: The card is common, but the steak is rare.

name: Barak Kodobane
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a 1, 2,\n__and 3-Cost spell.
flavor: They say he's a pro at horseback archery.

name: Carrion Drake
text: Battlecry: If a minion died this turn, gain Poisonous.
flavor: Fits easily into overhead luggage bins.

name: Cobra Shot
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion and the enemy hero.
flavor: "Cobra Shot" hurts way, way, way more than "Cobra Cuddle."

name: Corpse Widow
text: Your Deathrattle cards cost_(2) less.
flavor: Her marriage survived death, but it decayed pretty quickly after that.

name: Explosive Shot
text: Deal $5 damage to a minion and $2 damage to adjacent ones.
flavor: Pull the pin, count to 5, then shoot.  Then duck.

name: Explosive Shot
text: Deal $5 damage to a minion and $2 damage to adjacent ones.
flavor: Pull the pin, count to 5, then shoot.  Then duck.

name: Halazzi, the Lynx
text: Battlecry: Fill your hand with 1/1 Lynxes that have_Rush.
flavor: Remember, you’re only as strong as your weakest lynx.

name: Hunting Party
text: Copy all Beasts in your_hand.
flavor: Not sure I’d call it a good party if everyone ends up beside themselves.

name: Imported Tarantula
text: [x]Tradeable Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Spiders with Poisonous and Rush.
flavor: Which forbidden forest did you get this from?

name: King of Beasts
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each other Beast you have.
flavor: He never sleeps.  Not even in the mighty jungle.

name: Knuckles
text: After this attacks a\nminion, it also hits the enemy hero.
flavor: When confronted with accusations of performance-enhancing bananas, Knuckles replied, "I get my fruit from trees I knock down with my bare hands like everyone else."

name: Lesser Emerald Spellstone
text: Summon two 3/3_Wolves. (Play a Secret to upgrade.)
flavor:
An emerald stone for Tauren hands
Who sought its strength to save their lands
Their tribes now lost, their rage released
Who’s hunting now? And who’s the beast?

name: Piranha Launcher
text: [x]After your hero attacks,\nsummon a 1/1 Piranha.
flavor: A great improvement over the guppy launcher.

name: Princess Huhuran
text: Battlecry: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
flavor: She flitters around Ahn'Qiraj dreaming of the day she will meet a sweet prince, whom she can lay thousands of eggs with.

name: Ram Wrangler
text: Battlecry: If you have a Beast, summon a\nrandom Beast.
flavor: Not getting trampled is really the trick here.

name: Rotnest Drake
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding\na Dragon, destroy a random\nenemy minion.
flavor: Clean your room, or I'm taking your favorite minion away!

name: Teacher's Pet
text: [x]Taunt\nDeathrattle: Summon a\nrandom 3-Cost Beast.
flavor: Really goes the extra mile to get the Hay+.

name: The Rat King
text: [x]Rush. Deathrattle: Go\nDormant. Revive after 5\nfriendly minions die.
flavor: "I'm the giant rat that makes all of da rules!"

name: Tol'vir Warden
text: Battlecry: Draw two 1-Cost minions from your deck.
flavor: Ferocious in combat… and even more terrifying in pet battles.

name: Trampling Rhino
text: Rush. After this attacks\nand kills a minion, excess damage hits the enemy hero.
flavor: "Whew. I thought you said 'Trampoline Rhino.' Now that would have been scary."

name: Tundra Rhino
text: Your Beasts have Charge.
flavor: Tundra rhinos are often mistaken for kodos.  Or am I mistaken?

name: Tundra Rhino
text: Your Beasts have Charge.
flavor: Tundra rhinos are often mistaken for kodos.  Or am I mistaken?

name: Vilebrood Skitterer
text: Poisonous\nRush
flavor: It aspires to be a Vilebrood Dancer, but it has eight left feet.

name: Ball of Spiders
text: Summon three 1/1 Webspinners.
flavor: "THEY'RE EVERYWHERE GET THEM OFF!!!" - Everyone

name: Deathstalker Rexxar
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage\nto all enemy minions.
flavor: "You were too slow, old friend. The hunt began long ago. And now... it will never end."

name: Maxima Blastenheimer
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a minion\nfrom your deck. It attacks the\nenemy hero, then dies.
flavor: Believe it or not, this is only the faire's fourth most dangerous game.

name: Oblivitron
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a\nMech from your hand and\ntrigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: Reduce, reuse, re-rattle!

name: Rats of Extraordinary Size
text:
[x]Summon seven 1/1
Rats. Any that can't fit
on the battlefield go to
your hand with +4/+4.
flavor: They don't care if you believe they exist.

name: Savannah Highmane
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Hyenas.
flavor: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Hunter.

name: Savannah Highmane
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Hyenas.
flavor: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.

name: Savannah Highmane
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Hyenas.
flavor: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.

name: Scarlet Webweaver
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of a random Beast in your_hand by (5).
flavor: Isn't that nice? The spider made the explorer a sleeping bag!

name: Seeping Oozeling
text: Battlecry: Gain the Deathrattle of a random minion in your deck.
flavor: Uh, you might want to get that looked at.

name: Swarm of Locusts
text: Summon seven 1/1 Locusts with Rush.
flavor: Good things never come in swarms.

name: To My Side!
text: [x]Summon an Animal\nCompanion, or 2 if your\ndeck has no minions.
flavor: I hunt alone.  Well, me and Misha.  And Huffer.  And Leokk.

name: Unleash the Beast
text: Twinspell\nSummon a 5/5 Wyvern with Rush.
flavor: The Kirin Tor have always been lax in enforcing leash laws.

name: Veranus
text: Battlecry: Change the Health of all enemy minions to 1.
flavor: As an empty nester, she just misses her little ones.

name: Wild Bloodstinger
text: Battlecry: Summon a minion from your opponent's hand. Attack it.
flavor: Tame Bloodstingers would politely invite your minion to tea.

name: Abominable Bowman
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon\na random friendly Beast\nthat died this game.
flavor: Frosty the Bowman... was an angry hateful soul... with a fresh hewn bow and a missing nose...

name: Acidmaw
text: Whenever another minion takes damage, destroy it.
flavor: With the help of his trusty sidekick Dreadscale, the giant jormungar Acidmaw is ready to face any knight!

name: Boommaster Flark
text: Battlecry: Summon four 0/2 Goblin Bombs.
flavor: Every good plan requires a bit of patience. And a lot of explosives.

name: Crushing Walls
text: Destroy your opponent's left and right-most minions.
flavor: "It could be worse!" "It's worse."

name: Darkmoon Tonk
text: Deathrattle: Fire four missiles at random enemies that deal 2 damage each.
flavor: "Ready to roll out!"

name: Dinotamer Brann
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, summon King Krush.
flavor: Brann's new dino-taming hobby is going well—his pet can already make him sit, stand, and roll over!

name: Flark's Boom-Zooka
text: [x]Summon 3 minions from\nyour deck. They attack\nenemy minions, then die.
flavor: It used to be a Ba-zooka but we ran out of sheep.

name: Gahz'rilla
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, double its Attack.
flavor: The Sen'jin High football team is The Gahz'rillas.

name: Gladiator's Longbow
text: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
flavor: The longbow allows shots to be fired from farther away and is useful for firing on particularly odorous targets.

name: Gladiator's Longbow
text: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
flavor: The longbow allows shots to be fired from farther away and is useful for firing on particularly odorous targets.

name: Rhok'delar
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no minions, fill your_hand with Hunter_spells.
flavor: Rhok'delar is ready to Rhok'de'casbah!

name: Swamp King Dred
text: After your opponent plays a minion, attack_it.
flavor: Swamp King Dred, more like Swamp King Dead, amiright?

name: Vereesa Windrunner
text: Battlecry: Equip Thori'dal, the Stars' Fury.
flavor: Good things come in threes: Windrunner sisters and arrows of Thori'dal.

name: Beastmaster Leoroxx
text: Battlecry: Summon 3 Beasts from your hand.
flavor: Father of Rexxar, Champion of the Horde, and Flexxar, Champion of the Gym.

name: Call of the Wild
text: Summon all three Animal Companions.
flavor: "Hello. Misha, Leokk and Huffer aren't here right now, but if you leave a message we'll get back to you right away." BEEP.

name: Giant Sand Worm
text: Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.
flavor: Banned from every all-you-can-eat buffet on Azeroth.

name: Guardian Animals
text: Summon two Beasts that cost (5) or less from your deck. Give_them Rush.
flavor: The guidelines specifically state: "Students may also bring an ironbeak owl OR an alleycat OR a toad." They never said how big.

name: Jewel of N'Zoth
text: Summon three friendly Deathrattle minions that died this game.
flavor: This coveted gem calls for you to free it… and unleash an inescapable prison.

name: Kathrena Winterwisp
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Recruit a Beast.
flavor: She’s not one of those treehugger elves – but she does like the occasional cuddle.

name: King Krush
text: Charge
flavor: The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you don’t like standing in front of you.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 500 games as Hunter.

name: King Krush
text: Charge
flavor: The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you don’t like standing in front of you.

name: King Krush
text: Charge
flavor: The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you don’t like standing in front of you.

name: Emeriss
text: Battlecry: Double the Attack and Health of all minions in_your hand.
flavor: Taste your world's corruption! It tastes like chicken.

name: Nagrand Slam
text: Summon four 3/5 Clefthoofs that attack random enemies.
flavor: Come on and slam, and welcome to Nagrand!

name: Zul'jin
text: [x]Battlecry: Cast all spells\nyou've played this game\n(targets chosen randomly).
flavor: If you can dodge an axe, you can dodge a ball.
